jobDescription: LTS is looking for a Test Data Analyst/Test Engineer to join a Veteran Affairs effort. This resource will provide technical and data support to the Test Team and create test data for all Financial Health Services/Claims processing applications. This consultant will work with the test and EDI teams to create robust test data suites. Ensure all the test case have unique data-set created for each project. Responsibilities & Functions:Work with the Test team to help create the test data for each requirement/test caseExperience creating new EDI 835/837 claims files based on testing criteria a plusEvaluate, generate, execute, and maintain test data to ensure requirements coverage and explicability to positive and negative testingAssist with API and Data Feed setup with business partners and vendorsWork with external partners to ensure successful transactions with business partners and vendorsTake initiative, prioritize, and manage multiple detailed tasks in a fast-paces and ever-changing environmentDesired & Required:Experience supporting a Veteran Affairs or other large federal agencyBachelors Degree RequiredAbility to obtain and maintain a public trust clearance required
